name: Myron Fohr
introduction: Myron Fohr (born 17 June 1912 and died 14 January 1994) was an American racing driver who participated in the AAA Championship Car series between 1947 and 1951. During that time, finished 11th in the 1950 Indianapolis 500 and attempted to qualify for the 1951 Indianapolis 500, during which time it was a part of the Formula One championship.
